title: From Revisions to Insights: Converting Radiology Report Revisions into Actionable Educational Feedback Using Generative AI Models
details: S Lyo, S Mohan, A Hassankhani, A Noor, F Dako… - Journal of Imaging …, 2024
abstract: Expert feedback on trainees' preliminary reports is crucial for radiologic training, but real-time feedback can be challenging due to non-contemporaneous, remote reading and increasing imaging volumes. Trainee report revisions contain valuable …
